sentence.Network_en: Proportionately more Americans get married nowadays than ever before.
sentence.Network_cn: 从比例上看，美国现在结婚的人数比以前任何时候都多。

sentence.Network_en: The Irish educate proportionately more young people to university level than the British.
sentence.Network_cn: 按比例算，爱尔兰接受大学教育的年轻人比英国要多。

sentence.Network_en: A regressive tax, like the poll tax, takes proportionately more of a poor person's income.
sentence.Network_cn: 像人头税一样, 递减税占穷人收入的比例更大.

PerfectNetExp.abs: proportionate 相称的proportionately 相称地proportioned 成比例的
四六级名师丁晓... ... proclaim vt。 ① 宣告，宣布，声明②显示 proportionately adv。 相称地，成比例地，均衡地 prosperous a。 繁 …

the industry employs proportionately quite young people and this too have an impact on salaries as it clashes with those years when more women than men take time out to look … after children .金融业中的年轻人所占比例较高，这也会对薪水产生影响，因为与男性相比，在这一阶段有更多的女性需要抽出时间照顾孩子。
proportionately , more people make mobile-phone calls in Nairobi , Kenya's capital , than they do in New York .按比例来讲，现在肯尼亚首都内罗毕的移动电话拨打量要比他们在美国纽约的还要大。

entry.def: Proportionate means the same as proportional .

example.ex: Republics will have voting rights proportionate to the size of their economies...
example.tran: 各共和国将拥有与其经济规模成比例的选举权。

example.ex: The extra field cultivated meant a proportionate increase in work.
example.tran: 额外开发土地意味着工作量相应增加。

sentences.sentence: "your salary will rise proportionately to your workload"
"the height of this wall must be reduced proportionately to give the room pleasant dimensions"

auth_sentence.content: That means longer distance means proportionately higher cost and higher losses.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Copy those colours proportionately and you will always get it right.

auth_sentence.content: Or do I have to take out proportionately from both pretax and after-tax amounts?
auth_sentence.res_content: Or do I have to take out proportionately from both pretax and after-tax amounts?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or do I have to take out proportionately from both pretax and after-tax amounts?

sentences.en: A regressive tax, like the poll tax, takes proportionately more of a poor person’s income.
sentences.cn: 像人头税一样，递减税占穷人收入的比例更大。
